i1.name: Hemorrhage
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Darius'''' [[basic attack]]s and damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]] that strike with his blade cause enemies to bleed for 5 seconds, dealing {{pp|13 to 30}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} over the duration. The bleeding will trigger every {{fd|1.25}} seconds, and can stack up to 5 times, for a maximum of {{pp|13*5 to 30*5}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} over the duration.
Upon applying full ''Hemorrhage'' stacks to an enemy {{tip|champion}} or killing one with {{ai|Noxian Guillotine|Darius}}, '''Darius''' gains ''{{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius|Noxian Might}}'' for 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Noxian Might:}} '''Darius''' gains {{pp|18|30|35|40|45|50|55|60|65|70|75|85|95|105|130|155|180|205|230|formula=30+5 per level, then+10 per level from lvl 11, then+25 per level from lvl 14}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} and instantly applies full ''Hemorrhage'' stacks through his usual means.
i1.notes:
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} will not interact with ''Hemorrhage's'' damage.
** ''Hemorrhage'' will not trigger against structures.
** ''Hemorrhage'' will not be applied if the basic attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or if it {{tip|blind|misses}}.
*** ''Hemorrhage'' will be applied if the basic attack is {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}}.

'''Darius''' {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|changedisplay=true|type=enemy champions hit by the ''blade''|3|key=%|15 to 45|1;2;3+|formula=15%*Enemy champions hit. ''This is capped at 3 champions.''}} '''missing''' health}}}}. The ''shaft'' of '''Darius'''' axe will not apply {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|hemorrhage}} or heal him.

w1.name: Crippling Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Darius'''' next basic attack within 4 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 90% for 1 second.
''Crippling Strike'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Crippling Strike'' [[kill]]s its target it refunds its {{as|{{sti|mana|mana cost}}}} and half of its {{sti|cooldown}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Crippling Strike'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Darius'''' previous orders.
* ''Crippling Strike's'' target will only gain 1 {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} stack for the attack.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** As with most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Crippling Strike'' will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** ''Crippling Strike's'' damage will affect structures.

e1.name: Apprehend
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Darius''' {{tip|airborne|pulls in}} all enemies in front of him, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 1 second, and briefly grants {{tip|sight}} of the area around the pull.
e1.notes:
* ''Apprehend'' does not deal damage and thus will not apply any {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} stacks or any other spell effects.
* ''Apprehend'' can pull targets over terrain just as other similar abilities can.

r1.name: Noxian Guillotine
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{tip|lunge|leaping}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Darius''' attempts to execute the targeted enemy champion, dealing {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}}, increased by {{pp|type=[[File:Hemorrhage_2.png|20px|link=Darius#Hemorrhage]] [[Darius#Hemorrhage|hemorrhage]] stacks|6|0%|20%|40%|60%|80%|100%|0|1|2|3|4|5|displayformula=20%{{times}}hemorrhage stacks.}}.

If ''Noxian Guillotine'' kills its target, '''Darius''' causes all nearby [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s to {{tip|flee|flee in terror}} for 3 seconds during which they are rapidly {{tip|slow|slowed}} by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within the next 20 seconds at no additional cost. This can occur multiple times in succession.
At rank 3, if ''Noxian Guillotine'' kills its target, its {{sti|cooldown}} resets completely.
r1.notes:
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' has a cast time, and can only be interrupted by the death of either '''Darius''' or his target, by {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}}, or if '''Darius''' loses sight of his target.
** He will still suffer any [[crowd control]] effects (if duration permits) after the cast time ends.
** It does not go on cooldown or consume mana if it's interrupted.
* The cooldown of ''Noxian Guillotine'' will begin to tick down after the ability's first cast.
** It is not affected by {{ri|Presence of Mind}} during the recast time.
** The resulting cooldown is calculated by taking the values the moment the recast time finishes, and using this formula: (''Noxian Guillotine's'' Cooldown - time since first cast){{times}}(1 - {{sti|cdr}}).
*** If the ability's rank is 3 when the recast time times out, the resulting cooldown becomes 0.
* ''Noxian Guillotine'' will apply one stack of {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} or 5 if ''{{ai|Hemorrhage|Darius|Noxian Might}}'' is active.
** The ''extra'' {{ai|Hemorrhage 2|Darius|Hemorrhage}} stack will not be considered for the damage dealt by ''Noxian Guillotine''.
